pre_text_caption_evidence: assets held under capital leases are recorded at the lower of the net present value of the minimum lease payments or the fair value of the leased asset at the inception of the lease .
amortization expense is computed using the straight-line method over the shorter of the estimated useful lives of the assets or the period of the related lease .
accounts payable and other current liabilities dec .
original_metadata.question: in 2010 what was the percent of the total accounts payable and other current liabilities applicable
